sentence.Network_en: His van allegedly struck the two as they were crossing a street.
sentence.Network_cn: 据称，他的货车在那两人过马路时撞上了他们。

sentence.Network_en: He had allegedly tried to proposition a colleague.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说他曾试图向一名同事求欢。

sentence.Network_en: He lost his job for allegedly being incapable.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说他由于软弱无能而丢掉了工作。

the Sri Lankan military has described as a fabrication of video clip allegedly showing its soldiers killing prisoners during the final stages of the conflict with the Tamil Tigers rebels .最近一段视频剪辑片段显示，在于塔米尔猛虎组织冲突的最后阶段，一些士兵杀害囚犯。斯里兰卡军队称，视频纯属编造。

entry.tran: 声称的；被断言的；涉嫌的
entry.def: An alleged fact has been stated but has not been proved to be true.

example.ex: They have begun a hunger strike in protest at the alleged beating.
example.tran: 他们开始绝食以抗议有人所宣称的殴打行为。

means.word_mean: 1. according to what has been alleged;

Sentence.sentence: It seems very good for Harvard to honor such a high profile popularizer of the irrational…… at a time when political and religious nonsense so jeopardize the rule of reason in this allegedly enlightened democracy and around the world.
